analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xcfed26885acf068f42bdf90a38d5694006f8f611.sol:
	Contract HodlBetToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xcfed26885acf068f42bdf90a38d5694006f8f611.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/29/0xcfed26885acf068f42bdf90a38d5694006f8f611.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
